creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: woman with baby on back approaches a flock of pigeons; in middle ground, the massive orange and white gate of Gion shrine; pine trees in middle and background
marks: left: 自摺　昭和拾年作　祇園社 {jizuri, Shōwa jūnen saku, Gio LRC: よし田 {Yoshida}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Gion Shrine
